title: Learner-Centered Language Education Curriculum for Ensuring Quality in Transnational Distance Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and understanding of fundamental professional terminology
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented language courses for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields. Customized content reflecting regional and job-specific contexts.

learning_goals: Learners can collaborate with peers from diverse cultural backgrounds to complete language projects.
Learners can design and execute strategies to apply acquired language skills to real-world job situations.
Learners can self-manage learning goals while receiving social-emotional support in an online learning environment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
